wikipedia_page.main: Major General Sir Richard Hebden O'Grady-Haly,  (22 February 1841 – 8 July 1911) was a British Army officer who served as General Officer Commanding the Militia of Canada from 1900 to 1902.

response: In November 1839 Haly married Harriett Hebden: their eldest son was Major General Richard Hebden O'Grady Haly.
